description: Traces the development of Melbourne's water supply and depicts the steps taken to augment the Thomson River Scheme Projection of requirements to the year 2000. Also shown is the building of the Upper Thomson construction township and the planning, engineering, and conservation requirements of such a major scheme. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
